urls.description: Book By: 11:59 PM EDT on November 9, 2022 The best trip starts with the best savings. Book now for fares from $50* one way! Saver$ Club members get fares from $40* one way for an extra-great vacation with extra savings. Not a Saver$ Club member? Join the club to get member savings today! Get all current deals and offers directly in your email inbox. Sign up now! Get points for every dollar spent on fares and À La Smarte options. Become a Free Spirit ® member today and start earning now. * All fares must
